column2: Lincoln Project is saying Monday is going to be a good day too.
column5: Something is going down on Monday too. I guess Lincoln Project are “democratic operatives” — according to this guy. HAHAHA I think they are firmly planted in some heads — and I bet some people are pissing their pants right now like what do they know this time. Yes — big surprise — I do support the LP. I am also a progressive looking to get rid of traitors. I don’t care if you support them or not — but this is what they are saying. Stay tuned. #AbeKnowsAll pic.twitter.com/rzj4Ag2Tnc
